periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. South southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 62. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 80. South southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. South wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 75. South southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 73. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 48. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. North wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. East wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 76. Southeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southeast wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 79. Southeast wind around 7 mph.
